title: Mirror of Germany. No. 084 = Deutschland Spiegel
brief_description: Magazine items: The Federal President and General Lucius Clay in Berlin; German Federal Elections; homes for 20 million people built in 12 years; a bridge from Denmark to Germany; technical education for people from the African and Arab states; electronic ballet music; fashions; international model aeroplane contest; racing in miniature yachts.
